The Allegory of the Cave

Part One

Our story begins with a row of people watching shapes against a wall. This is all they know. As they watch, the shapes begin to move in place. The people are stunned. What is happening? Then, something else happens: the shapes begin to move back and forth. "What are we seeing?" the people ask themselves.
